Keywords: Animal , Pirate , Starjammers , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Unpronounceable
Special Powers
SALVAGE: FREE: If Hepzibah occupies or is adjacent to hindering terrain, roll a d6 and place it on this card [MAX 1]. // If Hepzibah has a die on this card, she modifies by +1 the listed combat value(s) matching the number on the die.// When she makes an attack, after resolutions remove the die. 3-4: Attack. 5: Damage. 6: Attack and Damage.
RESURRECTION OF CORSAIR: Once per game, when a friendly character with the Starjammers keyword would be KO'd, instead you may turn them to their last non KO click, then roll a d6 and heal them half the result. If you choose another friendly character for this effect, after resolutions turn Hepzibah to her last click. Protected: Pulse Wave.

Goop
I'm not sure why all these star jammers have ways to modify damage yet all have bcf. It was an odd choice to go with for this team. The once per game rez is kinda cool to save a fig from dying. All the starjammers are pretty weak so a fig save to a near last click is nice, but not amazing. Ok fig.
